Does anyone know how Backdrop typically handles links to pages that might result in an 'Access denied' error if the current user doesn't have the right permission? Should the link be hidden? Should the text remain, but no be linked? Or should the link remain and the error just informs people that they need more permissions?

See https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4663#issuecomment-709845093 for specific details.
